chifra argc: 3 [1:export] [2:0x1234567812345678123456781234567812345678] 
chifra export 0x1234567812345678123456781234567812345678 
cd $BLOCK_CACHE/monitors/ ; acctScrape --for_addr 0x1234567812345678123456781234567812345678 --useIndex ;acctScrape --for_addr 0x1234567812345678123456781234567812345678 --maxBlocks 10000000 ;
cd $BLOCK_CACHE/monitors/ ; grabABI 0x1234567812345678123456781234567812345678 ; acctExport --for_addr 0x1234567812345678123456781234567812345678
